Class Reports

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • info.Reports
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    public class Reports
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    The Reports class provides access to the reports properties
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(javax.servlet.ServletConfig config)
          throws javax.servlet.ServletException
        Handle the INIT operation. This operation is invoked by the servlet engine when it starts up. Set the reports properties if they have not already been set. This includes the proposal data path.
        Specified by:
        init in interface javax.servlet.Servlet
        Overrides:
        init in class javax.servlet.GenericServlet
        Parameters:
        config - The configuration object established by the servlet engine.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException

      • buildWarningsScript

        public static java.lang.String buildWarningsScript(java.lang.String reasons)
        Build and return a JavaScript program which will popup an alert box detailing the reasons that the input is in error.
        Parameters:
        reasons - A list of field names and associated reason for the error.
        Returns:
        The JavaScript program which produces a popup detailing any input errors and the associated cause.

      • accessDates

        public static java.lang.String accessDates(java.lang.String dateFilename,
                                           java.lang.String keyval)
        read .htAccessDates file searching for key value
        Parameters:
        dateFilename - date file, default is from .htproperties
        keyval - key name of search value
        Returns:
        String null or value founce for key provided

      • accessReports

        public static boolean accessReports(java.lang.String dateFile)
        accessReports This routine returns true if the PAS is open for reviewers Key = 'accessDate'
        Parameters:
        dateFile - filename of dates file .
        Returns:
        boolean true if current date is after the access date

      • accessPreReports

        public static boolean accessPreReports(java.lang.String dateFile,
                                       java.lang.String panel)
        This routine returns true if the current date is after the access date listed in the file for pre access to panel but before the end date listed in the file for that panel Key = ##start,##end where ## is the panel name
        Parameters:
        dateFile - filename of dates file
        panel - panel name
        Returns:
        boolean true if pre access allowed

      • adminAccessReports

        public static boolean adminAccessReports(java.lang.String dateFile)
        This routine returns true if Administrators are allowed access. This is before the site is open to reviewers. Key = adminDate
        Parameters:
        dateFile - filename of dates file
        Returns:
        boolean true if administrators are allowed access

      • chairLPAccessReports

        public static boolean chairLPAccessReports(java.lang.String dateFile)
        This routine returns true if Chairs are allowed access to the BPP reports. Key = chairLPDate
        Parameters:
        dateFile - filename of dates file
        Returns:
        boolean true if Chairs are allowed access to the BPP reports

      • accessPanel

        public static boolean accessPanel(java.lang.String dateFile,
                                  java.lang.String panelName)
        This routine is used if the site is open to Reviewers but a panel is not ready. If this entry exists, it will return true if current date is after the date in the file Key = ## (panel name)
        Parameters:
        dateFile - filename of dates file
        panelName - panel name
        Returns:
        boolean returns true if panel is open for Reviewer access

      • beforePeerReview

        public static boolean beforePeerReview()
        This routine returns true if it is before the peer review which is the Preliminary reports view Key = peerReviewDate
        Returns:
        boolean true if before the Peer Review

        Returns:
